remarks: Two vectors are equal iff their inner products with all other vectors are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

ip2eqi.u $e |- U e. CPreHilOLD $.
ip2eqi $p |- ( ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A. x e. X ( x P A ) = ( x P B ) <-> A = B ) ) $.

$d B x $.
